Article text: The Golden Louis   is a 1909 American short drama film  written and directed by  D W  Griffith     An old woman sends a girl begging in the streets of Paris on a snowy evening  Callous revelers pass her by  and she falls asleep before one donor finally drops a  golden Louis  in her shoe  A gambler with a sure tip on roulette but no cash borrows the coin to win a fortune for the girl  She wakes  and the two miss each other wandering the streets until the gambler finds the girl dead
